schedule.appointment.date

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • schedule.appointment.date.Date
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Date>

    public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Date>
    The date class creates valid dates in the mm/dd/yyyy format. Used for knowing past and future dates by comparing the date in question to today's date.
    Author:
    Jah C Speed, Abe Vitangcol

    • Method Detail

      • checkRange

        private boolean checkRange(int input,
                           int lowerBound,
                           int upperBound)
        Checks if an int is in between a specific range of numbers
        Parameters:
        input - the int being checked. lowerBound the lowest number the int can be. upperBound the highest number the int can be.
        Returns:
        true if the int falls within range, false otherwise

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Date date)
        Compare this date with a date in question and returns the type of date it is.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Date>
        Parameters:
        date - The date being compared to this date.
        Returns:
        0 if the dates are the same -1 if this date is before the param date 1 if this date is later than the param date

      • getMonth

        public Months getMonth(int id)
        Get the correct month from Months class for days in said month
        Parameters:
        id - the identification code for a specific month.
        Returns:
        month the correct month being asked for

      • isLeapYear

        private boolean isLeapYear(int year)
        Checks if the year is a leap year or not based on conditions for a leap year.
        Parameters:
        year - the year being checked.
        Returns:
        true if the year is a leap year, false otherwise.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Checks this date and sees if this date is a valid date on the calendar.
        Returns:
        false if the date is not valid, true otherwise.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Testbed main, used for testing this specific class to ensure all functions and methodologies, mainly isValid, work. See test case number before each print statement.

        public void parseDate(java.lang.String date)
        Takes a mm/dd/yyyy date and turns it into legible tokens to create a date object.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Prints out the specific date into a mm/dd/yyyy format.
